hackathon-description-text: The AGathon is Hawaii's premier agriculture - tech hackathon. It's purpose is to spark innovation and advancement within the Hawaii agricultural industry through the creativity and talents in Hawaii’s growing startup, technology, and developer community.
hackathon-rules:
If you're a minor, please identify yourself upon sign-up as we will require parental or legal guardian consent to participate.
Individuals and Companies cannot post a Submission that has been publicly available as of the Competition start date.
Team size should be less than 7 individuals
You can read our Code of Conduct 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First place team as determined by the judges.
Second place team as determined by the judges.
Third place team as determined by the judges.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1050 Queen St, Honolulu, HI 96814, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Potential to positively impact Hawaii’s agriculture industry as relevant to each respective Challenge (25%)
Quality of concept, including creativity, originality and commercial viability (25%)
Implementation of the idea (including user experience and design) (50%)

hackathon-description-header: The AGathon is Hawaii's premier agriculture - tech hackathon.
